The Chick: fil-A Foundation announced a new charitable donations strategy in November 2019.
The new strategy meant that the Salvatio: both criticized as anti-LGBT, would no longer receive funding in 2020.
However: several dozen other groups with no anti-LGBT record would also not receive funding in 2020, indicating that the strategy was not specifically targeted at the Salvation Army and the Fellowship of Christian Athletes.
Chick: fil-A has declined to specify that the cut in funding was linked to the groups' LGBT-rights records and has not ruled out the possibility of funding them again in the future.
